headline: NiSource Q3 Earnings Lag Estimates, Revenues Rise Y/Y, Capex Up
summary: NiSource's third-quarter EPS misses estimates despite higher revenues. The utility boosts its long-term capex to $28 billion through 2030.

raw.headline: NiSource Q3 Earnings Lag Estimates, Revenues Rise Y/Y, Capex Up
